ygData.subject: Re: Harlow..come to join ya guyz!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... ppl! No wonder I keep using the tell/friend command but cannot get u. So u insist in training a dark-elf?  Cool. ... What class are you? Last night I didnt
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
> Sorry my nick called Kenven so many of u cant add me :P
> Anyway the DarkElves are a cool bunch of ppl with the "Hi Breathen and
> Greetings Brother" showered me with scimitars and such..reallllly cool
ppl!

No wonder I keep using the tell/friend command but cannot get u.
So u insist in training a dark-elf? Cool.

> Only problem...I die too much :( and keep getting lost around...Currently
> Only saw Yiyang on the server..
What class are you?

Last night I didnt advance much, dun see u guys online. I team with a lvl
6 dward cleric who is blur sotong, hunting orc. He keep healing only
himself and let me die. Die 4 times on a straight row and lost a bar of
XP. I disband and hunt solo. After play for an hr or so just to recover
what I lost. ;(

Anyone can help me getting a great staff (not worn)? ;)
I'm now trying to gather money by hunting small animals/monsters outside
Felwithe, quite time consuming, worse is no XP gain, hunt for the sake of
loot only and sell. Earn 4pp so far but spend all on getting a senior
apprentice robe for mage. On the other hand, no kakis to team up hunting
for bigger monsters.

Maybe gotta start training a cleric to hunt for money/xp, at least cleric
got melee skill and can stand as a semi-tank, yet can cast some spells ;)

Ziltus (ok call me Zil, heh).
